title: View a Short Summary of Commits
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes made to their codebase over time. One of the most useful features of Git is the ability to view a summary of all the commits made to a repository. This can be helpful when trying to understand the history of a project or to identify when a particular change was made.

meta.title: Mastering Git Commit History: A Concise Summary
meta.description: Discover how to efficiently view and understand the commit history of your Git projects.
meta.keywords: version control, git summary, git log, git labs, git, commit history, git playground

steps.title: View a Short Summary of Commits

verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 查看提交的简短摘要
i18n.description: Git是一个强大的版本控制系统，它允许开发者随时间跟踪对其代码库所做的更改。Git最有用的特性之一是能够查看对存储库所做的所有提交的摘要。这在试图了解项目历史或确定何时进行了特定更改时会很有帮助。

meta.title: 掌握Git提交历史：简明摘要
meta.description: 探索如何高效查看和理解Git项目的提交历史。
meta.keywords: 版本控制, Git摘要, Git日志, Git实验室, Git, 提交历史, Git游乐场
